headline: The DoD Accelerator Managed by Accuidity Capital Management Announces a $6 Million Series A Investment in Baxter Aerospace
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 24, 2025--Forge Global Holdings, Inc. ("Forge," or the "Company") (NYSE: FRGE), a leading provider of marketplace infrastructure, data services, technology, and investment solutions for the private market, announced today that the DoD Accelerator fund, managed by Accuidity Capital Management ("Accuidity"), has made its inaugural defense-sector investment: a $6 Million Series A funding round in Baxter Aerospace.
